locations.name: Denis Private Island
locations.description: An exclusive private coral island offering barefoot luxury, a strong conservation focus, disconnection due to limited connectivity, and a chance to experience a protected ecosystem in 'Robinson Crusoe-style bliss'.

locations.name: Praslin Island
locations.description: A larger granitic island known for its lush landscapes, the legendary Vallée de Mai (home of the Coco de Mer), world-renowned beaches like Anse Lazio, and offering more opportunities for exploration and cultural interaction.
